itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 10-11 : Dr. J.B. Haws : Part II
title: Doctrine & Covenants 10-11 : Dr. J.B. Haws : Part II
description: What does Hank Smith mean when he says, “You can’t fool your family?” Join us for Part 2 of this episode with Dr. J.B. Haws as we learn how Hyrum Smith joins Joseph’s work and why Hyrum is described as having “integrity of heart.” If you would like to receive personal revelation from the Lord, learn more about Joseph and Hyrum’s relationship, and learn what the Lord means by “timing,” this episode is for you. Show notes available at followhim.co

itunes:author: Hank Smith & John Bytheway
